name: Blood Money, Good Money
description:
Six gangs are in constant war; a lot deaths, rivers of blood through the streets...SOMEONE SHOULD MAKE MONEY WITH THIS TRAGEDY!!

* TRADING WITH 12 DIFFERENTS GUNS


* GAIN THE TRUST OF ONE OF THE GANGS AND LEAD THEM TO VICTORY...OR SELL TO EVERYONE WITHOUT GETTING CATCHED


*GROW YOUR BUSINESS
